/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The highway, filled with cars and buses, stretches out ahead, a testament to the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the sides of the highway, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
